markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Wight](/Traits.aspx?ID=259)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 332</row>

A wight is an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature that drains life and stands vigil over its burial site.
name: Wight
